snippet: Shares of Bank of America, which fell below a psychologically important threshold of $5 last month, rallied on Thursday, Reuters notes.
abstract: Shares of Bank of America, which fell below a psychologically important threshold of $5 last month, rallied on Thursday, Reuters notes.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Bank of America, which fell below a psychologically important threshold of $5 last month, rallied on Thursday, Reuters notes. The stock was up more than 7 percent, at $6.24 in afternoon trading, buoyed by some encouraging jobs data. Read more »

headline.main: Bank of America Shares Rise Above $6
